notes:
[MASDAP (Malawi Spatial Data Portal)](http://www.masdap.mw/about/)  (Active in July 2015) 

Website for download and upload of spatial datasets and maps, managed by the National Spatial Data Center (in the Department of Surveys), in collaboration with the National Statistics Office and a number of technical Ministries, and supported by the World Bank.

Portal Functionalities include: 

Upload, Manage and Browse Spatial Data

Explore, Compose and Share maps

Search and Download Documents

Profiles for Users

 Hosts a variety of data categories, for download in shapefile or kml format.
